# [rattler-build](../rattler-build.md) debug

Debug a recipe build

## Usage
```
rattler-build debug <COMMAND>
```

## Subcommands
| Command | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| [`setup`](debug/setup.md) | Set up a debug environment from a recipe |
| [`shell`](debug/shell.md) | Open an interactive debug shell in an existing build environment |
| [`host-add`](debug/host-add.md) | Install additional packages into the host prefix |
| [`build-add`](debug/build-add.md) | Install additional packages into the build prefix |
| [`workdir`](debug/workdir.md) | Print the work directory path |
| [`run`](debug/run.md) | Re-run the build script in an existing debug environment |
| [`create-patch`](debug/create-patch.md) | Create a patch from changes in the work directory |
